Hoist worked diligently at the computer in the Hidden One, when the
muffle of the Tripredacus radio frequency. "What? What was that?" Hoist
asked very confused. He began to tap his fingers on the keyboard, as he
knelt over and  began to weld circuitry together. The message began to
come in clearer. "Great." He then opened a com-link to the Tripredacus.

"This is Hoist, Maintenance for the Autobots. Tell your troop to meet us
halfway, or Autobots will shoot first." He warned thinking of the
Dinobots.
